title: When will Ornn get a new skin?
body: I understand that there are many champions like Skarner who haven't had a skin since April 2015 but Ornn has been neglected with only one skin, his release skin, since his release in August 2017 while Qiyana has three skins, one of which is a prestige skin, since her release in June 2019. Please give us a new Ornn skin and give some love to the older champions.

replies.body: They only give skins to champs that are relevant or used in Pro-Play, Ornn isn't in either area, neither is Skarner.
I too would like to see Ornn get a new skin. Bless the ornn horn
